title: Groom, wearing moustache, light colored bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, holding knife with bride, wearing headpiece with mid length veil, necklace, light colored satin wedding dress with ruched bodice and tulle skirt, and cropped satin short sleeve jacket with embroidered collar, and elbow length lace gloves, standing behind table with light colored lace tablecloth and four tiered wedding cake in interior with fireplace and mantle, possibly for Crawford wedding, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
